Package com.attivio.sdk.search

Enum JoinFacetMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<JoinFacetMode>
      • com.attivio.sdk.search.JoinFacetMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<JoinFacetMode>
    public enum JoinFacetMode
extends java.lang.Enum<JoinFacetMode>
    Enumeration listing the possible facet modes for joined documents.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      DISTINCT
      A child document will only be included in facet counts once, even it it is a child of multiple parent documents.
      FULL
      A child document will be included in facet counts once for every parent document containing the child document.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Enum

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • DISTINCT

        public static final JoinFacetMode DISTINCT
        A child document will only be included in facet counts once, even it it is a child of multiple parent documents.

      • FULL

        public static final JoinFacetMode FULL
        A child document will be included in facet counts once for every parent document containing the child document.

        NOTE: Using this mode will require significantly more memory during query execution.
